header.subtitle: Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 225-45r19 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 225/45R19 Tire Size What kinds of vehicles are driving around on 225/45R19 tire size? Check out rides like the Nissan Juke, Mazda6, Honda CR-V, BMW 3 Series and Buick Encore. If you’re driving one of these vehicles, chances are you’re going to find that all-season tires are best for everyday driving thanks to their balance of road manners, low noise, year-round traction and ride quality. Check out premium 225/45R19 all-season tires like the Bridgestone Ecopia H/L 422 Plus, [Yokohama Advan Sport A/S+](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-sport-a-s-plus), Falken Ziex ZE960 A/S, and Kumho Ecsta PA51. Popular makes and models: 2019-2021 Nissan Juke
2012-2021 Mazda6
2001-2006 Honda CR-V
2013-2021 Buick Encore
2013-2019 BMW 3 Series For parts of the country that see a hard winter with lots of snow that stays around for weeks on end, all-season tires often can’t provide the kind of traction you really need. If that’s the case for you, we’d recommend dedicated winter tires like the [Pirelli Ice Zero FR](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/ice-zero-fr), Continental VikingContact 7, Nokian Hakkapeliitta R3, or Kumho WinterCraft Ice WI31. Maybe you’re the type of driver who likes to push the envelope a little and carve up corners, windy roads and onramps. If that’s the case, ultra-high-performance all-season tires can be the way to go thanks to their “stickier” tread formulation and optimized tread pattern. Check out premium tires like the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4, Toyo Proxes Sport A/S, and Hankook Ventus S1 Noble2 (H452). Whether you drive a BMW 3 Series, Buick Encore, Mazda6, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 225/45R19 tires that meets your needs at a great price!
